More than likely it is. The station I tape it off of
is KSCI channel 18 in southern CA, but it is not an
NHK station. KSCI has a variety of different asian
programs so it is probably the same type of thing in
your area.

Kevin

--- GCW <saitohworship@...> wrote:
> All right, that's it.  I REALLY have to ask this.  I
> only get cable, but it seems that there is a tv show
> called Shisengumi! on one of my tv channels (ch. 35)
> that is NOT NHK.  So I was sondering if this is the
> same show (note the name) or another one.  This
> channel 35 is not purely Japanese, but there's also
> Chinese, Korean, and Vietnamese languages and shows
> at different times (all asian, in short).  If
> anybody else lives in Southern CA and can tell me if
> it's the same tv show as the one on NHK, I would
> greatly appreciate it!  It has english subtitles,
> BTW ^ ^;;;
>  
> ~Saitohworship
